entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
